meta.name: meta_title
meta.data: Trying to Live, Trying to Learn: Homelessness on the rise in Colorado schools

meta.name: description
meta.data: Homeless students struggle with high drop-out rates, disabilities and behavioral problems in schools across Colorado. Their numbers have tripled in a decade.
